name: The Stowaway
description:
In the future commercial interplanetary travel has become an expensive but commonplace practice.  Ships are now fully automated and feature hypersleep pods for the passengers.  You have snuck aboard and hid in one of these ships on its way to Mars.  When suddenly something goes wrong, you are the only person capable of fixing the malfunctioning engine and saving everyone from the vast emptiness of space. 

The Stowaway is a first-person point and click adventure game in which you explore the isolating environment of a spaceship.  You will encounter a variety of different puzzles and challenges that you will need to overcome in order to repair the engine.  Look for clues and navigate through the ship, search for items left by the people who once worked there and try to piece together the story of the ship.  

This was the second project at Future Games and created in Unity. The project team was in total 9 people, 3 Designers, 3 Artists and 3 Programmers.
